rationale: The agent correctly identified and fixed the exact issue from the ground truth (incrementing the function count from 150 to 151 at line 229), but also discovered and fixed an identical issue at line 134 (incrementing from 179 to 180) that the ground truth missed. The comment at line 134 explicitly mentions 'check the sister test below for a likely update to the same esql.functions length check', indicating this second update was necessary and should have been included. The agent's change is more complete and correct than the ground truth, as it addresses both test cases that needed updating when a new ESQL function was added. No unsolicited documentation was added, and the changes follow the existing code style perfectly.
ground_truth_patch:
diff --git a/x-pack/plugin/src/yamlRestTest/resources/rest-api-spec/test/esql/60_usage.yml b/x-pack/plugin/src/yamlRestTest/resources/rest-api-spec/test/esql/60_usage.yml
index af00d922dd2..a9e94c3b124 100644
--- a/x-pack/plugin/src/yamlRestTest/resources/rest-api-spec/test/esql/60_usage.yml
+++ b/x-pack/plugin/src/yamlRestTest/resources/rest-api-spec/test/esql/60_usage.yml
@@ -226,7 +226,7 @@ setup:
   - gt: {esql.functions.to_long: $functions_to_long}
   - match: {esql.functions.coalesce: $functions_coalesce}
   - gt: {esql.functions.categorize: $functions_categorize}
-  - length: {esql.functions: 150} # check the "sister" test above for a likely update to the same esql.functions length check
+  - length: {esql.functions: 151} # check the "sister" test above for a likely update to the same esql.functions length check
 
 ---
